meanings.definition: A family of moths known for their silk-producing abilities.
meanings.sent1: Bombycids spin silk to make their cozy cocoons.
meanings.sent2: The bombycids in this garden are famous for their silk.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bombycids throw a party? To celebrate their silky success!
meanings.sent4: The bombycids' silk threads weave a tapestry of nature's beauty.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering silk of bombycids glows like moonlight in the dark.

meanings.sent1: Many bombycids fluttered gracefully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The bombycids of Bombycidae are fascinating creatures.
meanings.sent3: The bombycids from Bombycidae organized a picnic for all insects.
meanings.sent4: In the world of insects, bombycids are the noble members of Bombycidae.
meanings.sent5: The delicate wings of bombycids from Bombycidae shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: Farmers carefully tended to the bombycids for their silk.
meanings.sent2: Silk merchants traded the precious threads spun by bombycids.
meanings.sent3: The bombycids' silk was so soft that even clouds wanted to wear it!
meanings.sent4: The bombycids' silk production was a masterpiece of nature's artistry.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the bombycids' ability to create silk from tiny bodies.
